TopicTitle: Make the right click menus always on top

Articles.Content:
I`ve lost count how many times I need to access a right click menu in the flight screen only to have it be behind another window.

It would be great if there was an option for them to be always on top.

Definately. 

This is not just that they are behind mod windows, they are also behind windows like experiment results.
Part commander is your friend in these situations. You can tuck the box away from harm and unless it's a sudden need to select a particular part everything is easily available through the filters.

Definitely agree. My screen is rather cramped when the KER window is open, and the part dialogs keep opening behind it.

I know it's not SQUAD's job to fix mod issues, but like Foxster said, it also affects experiment dialogs.
